item.title: CVE-2023-28706|2024-10-22T15:31:35.270Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20airflow%20hive%20provider
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache Airflow Hive Provider.This issue affects Apache Airflow Hive Provider: before 6.0.0.
